author: sussman
msg: By the Authority Vested in Me by the Grand High Circle of Subverters,
I Hereby dub /trunk '0.31'.  Go Forthe and Branch.

author: sussman
msg: Finish #906 for real (a followup to r7319 and r7337): don't let a
post-commit-hook error stop the client from doing post-commit bumping.
svn_client__do_commit() returns a 'post commit hook' error, then the
commit still succeeded; go ahead and do the post-commit wc bumping.
The error will still be printed out later by reconcile_errors().
* CHANGES:  mention this change, as well as cmpilato's change to manpages.
